prompt:
I want you to judge predictions from 3 other LLMs from terms based on uses the Material Ontology to classify materials, processes, and properties in material science. First, I want to give you all [NUM_LABELS] possible answers for this dataset.
Now I want to give you all [NUM_LABELS] possibles answers:
[LABELS]
Now I will give you the predictions from 3 other LLMs and you will choose one best answer from 3 predictions with no explanation and in one line for example 'types': ['ANSWER'] Additionally, provide a brief reason (up to 100 words) in the format: 'reason': '...'
